entries.description: Step Functions: Updated previewStateMachine command to open with Workflow Studio instead
Lambda: Users can explore Serverless Land patterns
Step Functions: Added support for calling the TestState API in Workflow Studio
Step Functions: Added support for using Workflow Studio for editing ASL files in JSON and YAML
AppBuilder: selecting a runtime in the local invoke view can override the runtime specified in template.yaml
Step Functions: Allow starting state machine execution with no input provided
